|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 160 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ABTC-90; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620HCT-H; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6060;88E6060-RCJ, A36965.5, 0517 B0P, Taiwan; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:01:38 |oui = 00:01:38 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = PSPBoot;1.2.1.5;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.17_mvl21-malta-mips_fp_le;MontaVista; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1 |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, internal,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (9600 8N1),, J101 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.5.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = sti.admin5 |defaultssid = stiwifi |defaultssid_regex = ^stiwifi$ |default_ch = |manuf = XAVi |manuf_model = XW203ER-4 |manuf_rev = (01-SSC-5515) |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 2005 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1130;TNETW1130GVF, 54P4828 D4; |rad1chip2 = Radia;RC2422B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There is no FCC ID printed on the unit (but there is a FCC registration number). :The power adapter that came with the unit is an OEM AD-121A (12V, 1A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ===Credentials=== Multiple credentials appear to be usable with the HTTP interface. 
admin/sti.admin5 or xavi886/xavi886
The default credentials for telnet seem to be 
root/sti.admin5
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
<--- to SoC

J101
(GND) (RxD) [TxD]

       to wireless module -->
